description: Localised language(s) and characterset(s) used within the resource being described.

characterSet.description: Full name of the character encoding standard used by the resource(see http://www.iana.org/assignments/character-sets/character-sets.xhtml).

country.description: Designation of the specific country of the locale language(ISO 3166-1).

language.description: Language(s) used within the resource. Should be a valid ISO 639-3 code.
